alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Geneva, Walton, Holmes and northwestern Washington Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 913 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Samson to near Florala to near Laurel Hill. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Rock Hill and Glendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
